前阿仙奴後衛加拿斯：

迪亞高哥斯達能幫助到阿仙奴，Pepe的轉會費過高不是球員的錯。

他說道：“哥斯達能夠給球隊帶來個性，他只想贏球。如果他的隊友表現不好，他會在比賽期間罵他們，有時候我覺得這是好事。”

“是誰為Pepe支付了7200萬英鎊的轉會費？不是Pepe本人，而是阿仙奴。就目前來說，Pepe的表現並沒有說服任何人，所以我希望這對各間俱樂部來說是一個教訓。”

RB Leipzig haven’t made any official bid to sign Folarin Balogun this summer, contrary to recent reports of a pre-contract agreement with the club.

Football Insider reported on Wednesday that Folarin Balogun had agreed a pre-contract with RB Leipzig, preparing to leave Arsenal on a summer free transfer.

Fabrizio Romano denies the validity of this story, writing that RB Leipzig have not made an official bid to sign Balogun – at least not yet. Romano adds that the striker has more than 15 bids as a free agent this summer.

According to the Italian journalist, Balogun’s contract situation with Arsenal is stalling because he wants to play.

The Athletic recently reported that Folarin Balogun is close to signing a pre-contract agreement with a foreign club. Like Romano, they claimed the 19-year-old wants to play, adding he also wants more money than Arsenal are offering.

VfB Stuttgart are another possible destination, given claims in Germany that he’s had conversations with them. But for now, we don’t know exactly where he’ll end up – assuming he leaves at all.
